page.title: 05Farming on Leckford Estate
page.content: On Leckford Estate they grow{wheat, {barley,peas,oil seed rape,grass seed and{apples}They grow several varieties of each of these.The wheat grown is for biscuits,bread,animal food and seeds.500 acres is grown and the yield is 65 cwt per acre. On the estate they also grow spring barley.It's grown for making beer, fodder and seed.They grow 250 acres of barley with a yield of 50 cwt per acre. Peas are grown on 125 acres.They are food for animals and humans.From a 125 acre field they will get 30 cwt per acre. 300 acres of grass seed is grown and sold to other farmers
